# Interactive component

```{r, echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(dplyr)
library(tidyverse)
library(parcoords)
```

```{r echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
# Load Data
master_df <- read.csv(file = "data/master.csv")

master_df %>%
  na.omit() %>%
  select(c("year", "hydro", "nuclear", "solar", "wind", "coal", "gas", "oil", "biofuel", "other_renew")) %>%
  group_by(year) %>%
  summarise_all(list(sum))

write.csv(master_df,"data/interactive.csv", row.names = FALSE)
```
